message:
Hello, Nicholas,

I do not recommend using TPL Dataflow for throttling by time. TPL Dataflow is designed to always flow data through as quickly as possible. (The "throttling" in TPL Dataflow is more of a "don't process more than these *at the same time*", not "over a period of time").

For time-related operations, I recommend using System.Reactive. Rx has a number of built-in throttling systems that work with time durations.

And as a bonus, TPL Datafow and System.Reactive plug in well to each other!
